text.p: Finnish trading house Valtameri said on Wednesday it proposed a 3.30 markka dividend per share for the financial year 1996-1997 and confirmed a preliminary 8.38 markka profit per share for the period.

"Valtameri's board proposes for the annual general meeting to be held on September 11, 1997 that a 33 percent dividend, or 3.30 markka per share, be paid on both the ordinary and the preferred shares," it said in a statement.
Valtameri's 1995-96 dividend was 2.00 markka per share.

As earlier reported, earnings per share in the year to end-April rose to 8.38 markka from 4.87 markka, operating profit was 12.9 million markka, up from 7.2 million, and net sales rose to 52.1 million markka from 27.6 million, it said.
